most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/license":{"text":"Plugin Tools Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list":{"text":"{ "tiddlers": { <$list filter="""[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]butlast[]]""">"<$text text=<>/>": <$text text=<>/>, <$list filter="""[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]last[]]""">"<$text text=<>/>": <$text text=<>/> } }","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list","name":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools","list":""},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin":{"text":"{ "tiddlers": {} }","type":"application/json","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin","plugin-type":"Generally plugin, language or theme","description":"Description of plugin","dependents":"","name":"Brief name of the plugin","list":"readme license"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme":{"text":"\define p() \define a()<

> \define b()<

> This plugin is an alternative to packaging a plugin using [[Node.js|http://tiddlywiki.com/#TiddlyWiki%20on%20Node.js]] or the [[browser developer console|http://tiddlywiki.com/dev/#How%20to%20create%20plugins%20in%20the%20browser]]. This plugin adds the <> ''shadow'' button to the View Toolbar and also the <> plugintools tab to the Sidebar. The View Toolbar button becomes <> ''plugged'' when selected and then the tiddler title appears in the list of tiddlers to be packed on the <> Sidebar tab. Unneeded plugin tiddlers can be removed from the list by using the <> ''plugged'' button in the tiddler or next to the item in the list. The ''Pack Plugin'' button on the sidebar tab opens the plugin template in edit view and fills in the dependents field. Set the plugin title, e.g. $:/plugins/yourname/pluginname, and also the following fields on the tiddler: |!Field |!Value | |''description'' |Plugin description | |''list'' |Names of exposed plugin information tiddlers, for example: readme license | |''name'' |Plugin name (only needed for themes) | |''plugin-type'' |Either "plugin" for a regular plugin, "theme" for a theme, or "language" for a language pack | |[[additional|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Plugin%20Fields]] |Add as needed | Remove tiddlers by only selecting tiddlers you want in the plugin and hit ''Pack Plugin'' again. [[Export|https://tiddlywiki.com/#How%20to%20export%20tiddlers]] the plugin using JSON format for library format. This plugin comprises: * Image * Template * Stylesheet * Sidebar tab * Caption and hint","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/readme"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar":{"text":"\define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define a() Plugin title:<$edit-text tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' field='name' placeholder='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/plugin'/><$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list]]'>

<$link to={{!!title}}><$view field='title'/> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}} class=<>><$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/><$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$vars f={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-color}} s={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet!!button-outline-color}}> <><$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Plugged/Caption}}/>
<$wikify name='a' text={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list}}><$vars b={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list!!name}}><$button><$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> dependents={{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/list!!list}}/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-edit-tiddler' $param=<>/>Pack Plugin","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/sidebar","tags":"$:/tags/SideBar","list-before":"","caption":"<$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/image}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/language/SideBar/Plugintools/Caption}}"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet":{"text":".tc-tab-buttons button.tc-tab-selected {fill:{{!!tab-icon-selected-color}};stroke:{{!!tab-icon-outline-color}};}.tc-tab-buttons button:not(.tc-tab-selected) {fill:{{!!tab-icon-unselected-color}};}html .tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-plugintools svg {fill:{{!!button-color}} !important;stroke:{{!!button-outline-color}};stroke-width:2;height:1em;width:1em;}.tc-badge-plugintools {fill:#000;stroke:#c09;stroke-width:2;}.tc-icon-plugintools {fill:#fff;height:24pt;width:24pt;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","tab-icon-unselected-color":"#999","tab-icon-selected-color":"#ff0","tab-icon-outline-color":"#000","caption":"Plugin Tools","button-outline-color":"#000","button-color":"#ff0"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintools/template":{"text":"\define add() [[$(currentTiddler)$]]+[sort[]] \define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] title: $:/plugins/ajh/plugintools
description: Plugin tools to bundle multiple tiddlers
